summary: When a wise diplomat's plane crashes in the snows of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.
cast: Ronald Colman|Jane Wyatt|Edward Everett Horton|John Howard|Thomas Mitchell|Margo|Isabel Jewell|H.B. Warner|Sam Jaffe|Norman Ainsley|Chief John Big Tree|Wyrley Birch|Beatrice Blinn|Hugh Buckler|Sonny Bupp|John Burton|Tom Campbell|Matthew Carlton|Eli Casey|David Cavendish|George Chan|Darby Clark|Corleen Clemons|David Clyde|Robert Cory|Beatrice Curtis|Jack Deery|Mary Lou Dix|Val Duran|Neil Fitzgerald|Willie Fung|Moning Gonzales|Lawrence Grant|Antonion Herrera|Joe Herrera|Glenn Howard|Boyd Irwin|Noble Johnson|Manual Kalili|George Kaluna|Harold Lishman|Richard Loo|Robert Lugo|Richard Master|Margaret McWade|John Miltern|Ray Mitchell|Joe Molina|Henry Mowbray|Leonard Mudie|John T. Murray|Wedgwood Nowell|Milton Owen|Arthur Rankin|Ruth Robinson|Richard Robles|Alex Shoulder|Joe Shoulder|James Smith|Carl Stockdale|John Tettener|Ed Thorpe|David Torrence|Eric Wilton|Barry Winton|Victor Wong|Ernesto Zambrano
title: Horizontes perdidos
